data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 10,501 believers in the county of Nainital with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Nainital, Uttarakhand, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Nainital, Uttarakhand, India to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Please, convict the 10,501 believers in Nainital, Uttarakhand, India to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the county of Nainital. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Sayyid Husaini people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, for those in trouble in the county of Nainital prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Nainital words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.section_summary:
the county of Nainital, Uttarakhand, India has a population of 954,600.

We estimate Nainital has 10,501 people who might know Jesus, 11,582 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 932,517 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Nainital.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
